Posts.Content: Heidi207 wrote: Good morning ladies, I'm wondering about scans (PET and Bone) after surgery. Have been receiving conflicting opinions from several doctors and am seeking information about how it worked for you. An oncologist literally told me yesterday that if she submits a scan request with the reason being "breast cancer" they will absolutely find something on a PET scan. Then if we repeat the scan several months later it will probably be clear. She did not recommend the scans but told me she would do so at my request, then cautioned me to the results. So, my questions are: Did you have scans post-surgery? How soon afterwards? Did your doctor automatically recommend these or did you have to request it? And of course did they find something?  Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
